body:
I'd love some more creature ability symbols - There's already one for flying and for summoning sickness.
How about Trample, Protection (for each colour+artifacts) etc.

Original request - http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3736&p=137782#p137772
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: more creature ability symbols
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on November 16, 2013 07:02:49_

I'd love some more creature ability symbols - There's already one for flying and for summoning sickness.
How about Trample, Protection (for each colour+artifacts) etc.

Original request - http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3736&p=137782#p137772

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=423_
